text: The palatal ejective is a type of consonantal sound, used in some spoken languages. The symbol in the International Phonetic Alphabet that represents this sound is . ==Features== Features of the palatal ejective: ==Occurrence== This sound is largely confined to the indigenous languages of the Americas. It sometimes contrasts with a , but does not always do so. It occurs in: * Haida * Jaqaru * Tindi, a Caucasian language * Nǁng, a Khoisan language * Keres ==See also== * List of phonetics topics ==External links== * Category:Ejectives Category:Palatal consonants Category:Oral consonants Category:Central consonants
title: Palatal ejective stop
